snippet: In a new test for the company’s stock, over 1.6 billion shares will be eligible to come on the market in several waves when a number of shareholders are allowed to sell.
abstract: Facebook faces a new test for its stock, as over 1.6 billion shares will be eligible to come on the market in several waves when a number of shareholders are allowed to sell; shares have lost more than 40 percent of their value since the May offering; some investors are bullish and see long-term value, while others think an influx of shares will cause the value to drop.

byline.contributor: Evelyn M. Rusli contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: In a new test for the company’s stock, over 1.6 billion shares will be eligible to come on the market in several waves when a number of shareholders are allowed to sell.

headline.seo: Facebook’s Stock Has Suffered, but Some Investors See Long-Term Value
headline.main: A Steep Climb Back for Facebook’s Stock
